language.question: Mother's maiden name?
Name of your first pet?
Your favourite colour?
language.text: I pre-booked on the website - I have the confirmation email - TOUCH HERE
I did NOT pre-booked on the website - I do NOT have a confirmation email - TOUCH HERE
I did NOT pre-booked on the website - I do NOT have a confirmation email - TOUCH HERE
Please scan the barcode on your confirmation email, using the scanner below
Your registration details could not be found, please check it carefully and try again
The barcode you have entered is invalid, please check it carefully and try again
Your wristband number is invalid, please scan it again or type it in carefully
If you are having problems, please type in your booking reference number below:
PLEASE ENTER YOUR DETAILS TO RECOVER YOUR REGISTRATION
Please choose a security question from the dropdown menu below. This is necessary to retrieve your photo online later:
Please choose a security question from the dropdown menu below. This is necessary to retrieve your photo online later:
Please answer your chosen security question

by pressing CONTINUE
I agree to the Terms and Conditions
Please scan your wristband using the scanner below
If your wristband wont scan, click below to enter this manually:
You are now ready to have your photo taken, once you press the button below you have 5 seconds to get in position
PRESS HERE TO RETURN TO THE START
Please pose like you are holding the trophy above your head.
